sub_title: Sr. Financial Data Scientist at Royal Philips
summary:
Experienced technical leader with 14+ years of combined experience in Innovation, R&D, Manufacturing and Business Processes within Philips in Asia and Europe. 

•	Experience in product design from concept to mass production. 
•	Adept at business analytics, data driven business decisions and six sigma methodologies. 
•	Co-Founder and CTO of a Dutch startup.
•	Developing and managing pioneering offshore R&D outsourcing model with global implications for the Philips and the supplier.
•	Experience working in a global environment in cross-functional teams.
•	Certified in six sigma methodologies.
•	Six international patents which includes one game changing invention (blockbuster commercial success, Philips PerfectCare Expert steam generator Iron). 
•	Gained international cross-cultural exposure and established a wide international network while working and studying in Asia and Europe.

Specialties: Analytical & conceptual problem solving, Data-driven decision making, Innovation process, New product development (concept to mass production), Value-Based management, Project management, Cross-Functional relationship development, Innovation portfolio management, Business management & forecasting, Strategic planning, Account management, Six Sigma methodologies.

profile_positions.title: Financial Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
Consulting assignments to on following topics:
•	New Range & portfolio logic buildup based on benefit ladder, superiority claims and analysis of segmentation data (China)
•	Contributing to BMC (Business Market Combination) plan and strategic roadmap (china focused).
•	Working on business case, user & business requirements and VPC for strategically critical project against biggest competitor in China.
•	Creating automated tool for value based price calculations to be used for interactive dynamic workshops across countries.
•	Using volumetric simulator based on conjoint analysis to build and analyze numerous 2017 portfolio scenarios and help arrive at best portfolio selection (in addition to various other sources of inputs for decision making).  
•	Extensively using business analytics to drive decision making.
•	Working on the topic of 'value leakage' due to cross border flow of finished goods across countries worldwie.
profile_positions.title: End2End (E2E) consultant (Consumer Marketing)

profile_positions.description:
•	Drive change in complex organization as a change agent dealing with people, processes and tools. 
•	Liaise as a critical link between the central team and the business organizations for the deployment of the C&CM processes. 
•	Support in deployment of processes in the lead deployment site by adapting the processes and organizational setup towards a common ground. 
•	Responsible for signing-off for core C&CM process on change management on behalf of sector towards the central team.
profile_positions.title: Sector Lead Business Process Expert (BPE), Change and Configuration Management (C&CM)

profile_positions.description: Provided technical support to manufacturing assembly processes and product design in projects in complete innovation chain within the organization by solving complex technical problems and proposing optimum product design using Finite Element methods and computer simulations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Engineer (Product Development, R&D)

company.name: ENWAKE Holding BV (Dutch Registered Startup) Advanced Wearable Technology.

profile_positions.company: ENWAKE Holding BV (Dutch Registered Startup) Advanced Wearable Technology.
profile_positions.description:
An idea to solve the jet lag and fatigue issue that was created as a business plan in MBA module of on Entrepreneurship eventually lead to formulating the startup jointly with Aleksandar Dimitrov and Branislav Nikolic. The accomplishments of the startup include:

•	Semifinalist in Philips Innovation awards 2012. Reward amount used for filing patent application. 
•	Winner of Erasmus Center of Entrepreneurship (ECE) startup competition with 5K reward in presence of Prime Minister Mark Rutte. Opportunity to present the first prototype to the PM. 
•	Awarded office in Rotterdam Science tower as a price for winning the competition. 

Currently a shareholder.

Bedrijfsnaam: Enwake B.V.
Kvk nummer: 61183822
Vestigingsnummer: 000030305454
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder and CTO

company.name: Philips High Impact Innovation center, Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
1) Providing high quality technical consultancy and solutions to various innovation projects and complex problems from Philips Innovation sites across the world (USA, Singapore, Netherlands and Austria). The projects resulted in numerous successful products in the market: SensoTouch electric shaver • Sonicare Airfloss & Electric toothbrush • PerfectCare System iron etc.

2) Managing front-end innovation project which involved:
  • Scouting, screening and ranking for potential technologies.                    
  • Formulating scientific objective tests and consumer based subjective tests.                   
  • Using open innovation to explore new technologies.                   
  • Conducting patent landscaping to study competitors trends w.r.t to product architecture and technologies.
  • Collaborating within Philips as well as external network for expert advice.                 
    • Working closely with consumer marketing and program management.                   

3) Building knowledge in the area of computational mechanics and translation of the knowledge into technology development programs and roadmaps within Philips.

4) Setting up and maintaining excellent internal and external network w.r.t technology innovation programs.

* Successfully completed executive MBA while working full time with Philips. Applied knowledge from various courses to practical cases within Philips.
profile_positions.title: Senior Technical Consultant / Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
1) Instrumental in setting up and managing a pioneering, role-model outsourcing initiative in engineering services (with global implications for the company) which eventually resulted in the setting up of a dedicated center for Philips in India.
              •	Played key role in early stages of the relationship by negotiating for lowest hourly rates, drafting contract agreements, formulising way of working etc. Interfaced as a relationship and account manager while managing the outsourcing program with the supplier.
              •	Intellectually crafter project plans and forecasts for smooth execution of the outsourced projects with ambitious deadlines while managing an offshore team of 10-15 engineers in India.

2) Astutely re-designed key component of a product to reduce cost by 20%; realizing savings of * Million per year (sales volume: 3M/yr). Represented R&D in a cross-functional team and played a pivotal role involving collaboration with manufacturing, quality, consumer research center, business analysis and consumer marketing to coordinate various activities from requirement analysis, concept selection, product specifications, detailed design, prototyping and testing to mass production in Batam (Indonesia).

3) Solely developed and managed simulation competence in the area of Structure (finite element), Thermal, Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), Drop test and provided consultation to internal customers on optimal design directions. Rich experience in the area of using numerical tools and simulations for optimizing product design process resulting in drastic reductions in product development time and costs.

4) Filed six patents in six years with various inventions realizing in winning products.
* Seed Inventor for a breakthrough invention that increased average market share for the product category by 30% within two months of launch resulting in a market leader position in that category. Winner: Top 10 home innovations in IFA 2011 (Patent # WO2010131148)
